post.author: Oneofthe8devilz
post.body:
23rd Century Warfare is a Quake Wars multiplayer modification developed by Scared Pixel Studios. It enhances the visuals, realism and sounds of the game staying true to the "unified light and shadowing" concept while also introducing new gameplaytypes and maps.

FullScreen Bink Executable Movie: http://www.556mmfmj.com/public/23rd_c_w_usmc.zip (58 MB)

Streamable Windows Media Video: http://www.scared-pixel-studios.com/public/streamable/23rd_c_w_usmc.wmv (41 MB)

Much more to follow soon...

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
I don't know if all models and textures are yours since i don't know ETQW too much...

...but i suppose that's a good thing if i can't tell what's SD assets and what's yours!

post.author: Neurological
post.body: Textures are standard ones of QW, but I see a big graphic improvements and an awesome megatexture.

post.author: Oneofthe8devilz
post.body:
Quote:
23rd Century Warfare is a Quake Wars multiplayer modification developed by Scared Pixel Studios. It enhances the visuals, realism and sounds of the game staying true to the "unified light and shadowing" concept while also introducing new gametypes and maps.


In terms of texturework this means we skipped megatextures for their limited light interactivity using baked in information .. resulting in everything being dynamic and rendered in realtime

Quote:
No megatextures were harmed in the production of this movie !

post.author: Ww3
post.body:
How many players will this be?

So far I see just one player-entity on screen at a time.

post.author: Oneofthe8devilz
post.body:
Ww3 wrote:
How many players will this be?

So far I see just one player-entity on screen at a time.


We currently have setup the maps for 32 players running lagfree...

post.author: Mordenkainen
post.body: Nice video, looking forward to seeing more.
